name: Mancala - Online multiplayer
description:
Get back to basics and play the classic game of Mancala on your iPhone,iPod touch and iPad! You can play against the computer or friend online or offline.
Mancala is from ancient times. It is one of the oldest known board games. There are many variants including Oware,Awale, Ayo, Warri, Ouri, Ncho, Awele, but this game uses the most popular, Kalah.

Features
- Play with cpu on your device! No internet needed!
- Play with friend on your device! No internet needed!
- Play with facebook friend on your device! internet needed!
- Play and chat with cool emoticons.
- Instructions - Learn how to play, or check out the rules if you need a refresher.
- amazing graphics.
- time killing.
- New graphics for winter theme.
